entry.title: FROST ADVISORY ENDED, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:07 a.m. EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High 14 except 7 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this afternoon. High 14 except 7 near Lake Erie. UV index 7 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Clear this evening and after midnight then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers overnight. Wind becoming east 20 km/h before morning. Low 6. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
